attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: Initial Admin User
attrs.description: Sets the initial admin username

attrs.label: Initial Admin Password
attrs.description: Sets the initial admin password

attrs.label: Run Optimize Scripts
attrs.description:
Runs the following commands at startup:</br>
occ db:add-missing-indices</br>
occ db:add-missing-columns</br>
occ db:add-missing-primary-keys</br>
yes | occ db:convert-filecache-bigint</br>
occ maintenance:mimetype:update-js</br>
occ maintenance:mimetype:update-db</br>
occ maintenance:update:htaccess</br>

attrs.label: Default Phone Region
attrs.description:
Sets the default phone region in ISO_3166-1 format (e.g. US).</br>
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements

attrs.label: Access IP
attrs.description: Set to the IP-Address used to reach Nextcloud.

attrs.label: Force Enable Allow Local Remote Servers
attrs.description: Enables 'allow_local_remote_servers' option

subquestions.label: Enable imaginary
subquestions.description:
Enable imaginary to generate previews in the background.</br>
It will also deploy the needed container.

subquestions.label: Enable cron
subquestions.description: Enable cron to generate previews in the background.

attrs.label: Enable Notify Push
attrs.description:
Enable and Configure Notify Push.</br>
It will also deploy the needed container

attrs.label: Enable ClamAV
attrs.description:
Enable and configure ClamAV.</br>
It will also deploy the needed container.</br>
Keep in mind that this will run as root.</br>
https://github.com/Cisco-Talos/clamav/issues/478

attrs.label: Enable Collabora
attrs.description:
Enable and configure Collabora.</br>
It will also deploy the needed container.</br>
Keep in mind that this will run as root.

attrs.label: Enable OnlyOffice
attrs.description:
Enable and configure OnlyOffice.</br>
This will NOT deploy the needed container.</br>
You need to deploy it yourself.

attrs.label: Interned Strings Buffer
attrs.description: The amount of memory used to store interned strings, in megabytes.

attrs.label: Max Accelerated Files
attrs.description: The maximum number of keys (and therefore scripts) in the OPcache hash table.

attrs.label: Memory Consumption
attrs.description: The size of the shared memory storage used by OPcache, in megabytes.

attrs.label: Revalidate Frequency
attrs.description: How often to check script timestamps for updates, in seconds. 0 will result in OPcache checking for updates on every request.

attrs.label: JIT Buffer Size
attrs.description: The amount of shared memory (in megabytes) to reserve for compiled JIT code. A zero value disables the JIT.

attrs.label: Main Service
attrs.description: The Primary service on which the healthcheck runs, often the webUI

22.2.18.app_readme:
A private cloud server that puts the control and security of your own data back into your hands.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/nextcloud

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
22.2.18.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

22.2.17.app_readme:
A private cloud server that puts the control and security of your own data back into your hands.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/nextcloud

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
22.2.17.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
